review: best review'slmasoYou know a game is good when it's the last thing you think about at night and the first thing you want to do in the morning.Rocket League made me forget to masturbate. I hate sports games.I hate cars.I hate football/soccer.I'm in love with Rocket League. Rocket League has one of the best progression systems I've ever seen in a video game before...Rookie You can't hit You are a disgrace to your team and the game.Semi Pro You can now sometimes hit the ball. Don't even try to hit it in the right direction or think about your positioning. You're only Semi Pro so you can just go ahead and hit that ball! You also made a bicycle hit that one time but yeah nah you're still Pro You have learnt how to shoot the ball accurately from the ground. You're the best! Late into Pro level you would have likely looked up advanced tips for Rocket League. Worst mistake of your life. You now know what aerials are. You think you can fly. The ball comes up high and you go for an aerial. Once you jump you fly straight into the ground and continue to do frontflips until you land on your back... What the happened there? Oh. You're using keyboard. Yeah nah time to get a controller head.Veteran You now have a controller and go for terribly unlikely aerials. You think you're good. You can hit the lower aerials consistently and you can now be considered an addition to your team. Congratulations!Expert You can now consistently hit aerials accurately at any height. This game is now your life. You can also score off a wall every now and then. Good times.Master You are now a god to every level lower than you. You have perfected the art of wall shots. You are an extremely cool person. A nice little bonus is that everyone under the level of Pro will now spam "Sorry!" every time they do something wrong to you.Legend The most badass looking title you can have. Rocketeer. You probably now have an extreme case of false confidence. Once you get used to the badass title you'll wreck anything and anyone with ease. You can also pull off freestyles consistently. Nice job! Also be sure to prepare for an endless stream of "You're not good enough for Legend!"Rocketeer You can now 720 freestyle backflip reverse backwards aerial air dribble off a wall with ease. You probably boosted for that Rocketeer tag but if you didn't Still prepare for another endless stream of "You're not good enough for Rocketeer!"But in all seriousness I absolutely love this game and I'm sure anyone will. I've literally never seen someone dislike this game after they've played 10 hours. (Rocket League moves onto a whole nother level of fun and addiction once you learn how to fly.)If you're still contemplating buying this game after reading this review just trust me when I say it is one of the most fun and addictive games I've ever played (more gripping than Skyrim and GTA). Think about it this way You wouldn't have made it this far through the review if you didn't secretly want this game. Ignore the childish looking pictures on the store page. Just get this game. This is the one. The game is incredible in every aspect!Wow!Wow!Wow!Chat has been disabled for 3 seconds. I love Carball Space Program This is my experience after playing the game for the first time with a friend got game made party got into a casual 2v2 match 2 a.m. window wide open forgot start match 30 minutes of rage/joy/fun/screaming someone starts bashing on my front door figure it's downstairs neighbour go silent ignore still bashing still silent/ignore almost breaks down my door have to open see who it is see cops jail imminent panic open door act nice cop says he heard me down on the street in his car with his windows closed start tting him I say the neighbour usually warns me first before calling the cops cop says it wasn't the downstairs neighbour who called but the one in the BUILDING ACROSS THE STREET almost start laughing cop asks WTF was I doing start tting him again he asks why I have the window open say I totally forgot he asks "What game are you playing?" he knows. I ask "Is that a serious question?" he says "Don't t me I've been a gamer for 15 years what game?" I say "Rocket League." he gives me a slight smile/nod of approval/understanding HE KNOWS. gives me back my ID "Keep the noise down goodnight."911/10 would be arrested again. If you like to be toxic and blame your teamies for your own mistake this is a must buy. 10/10 would blame my friends again. Like FIFA but more realistic In the 80s and 90s this is what everyone thought video games would be like in the future rocket cars playing virtual sports TRONxSpeed Racer with the international appeal of soccer.You're jacked in to this new thing called the Internet where you can play against people the world 'round. You're a weakly 13 year old midwesterner named Billy but when you're jacked in you're Tom Cruise in Top Gun no Days of Thunder. You're the best there ever was.Stay on target stay on target... click blarp. You're out of rocket fuel! You click again just in case like a last desperate pull of an empty gun's trigger. The clock ticks downward as you swerve towards a boost pickup... you grab it... seconds left on the clock... the ball appears in front of you as an angel out of the blue... you jump squeeze the last bit of juice out of your machine and soar heavenward... AND IT'S GOOD! BILLY FROM THE MIDWEST HAS DEFEATED THE RUSSIAN MENACE!!!!Every second you play the game is the last five minutes of every sports movie ever made. In this game everyone just like a puppy running for a ball. After 1200 hours I consider that I haven't played long enough to post a solid review about this game yet.UPDATE After 1300 hours I'm starting to feel this game might be just a little addictive. I consider I'm now prepared to stop playing offline with bots and head to the online modes to see what they can offer.Thanks for all the support I'll keep you updated. I bought the Oculus Rift July 7th. I bought this game the 9th. I haven't touched my Oculus.10/10 would waste savings again Exactly like school nobody ever passes to me everyone pushes me around.... most fun i'd ever had playing with balls mind you. i spend a lot of time playing with balls. 11/10 best soccer car game ever! buy it !!too many modes and too many updates !

review: Love the game but something still 3 years later makes the game very hard if not impossible to play at times. The turning is so inconsistant from day to day. Some days I cant seem to get my car to turn at all and other days I cant keep the car straight because it turns so fast. With over 3500 hrs of play time I can assure this is not in my head and Ive tried just about everything I can think of and followed every user created video to get this to go away and just be a consistant game. But sadly I cant seem to find a fix for this. I also realize not everyone has this issue but for those of us that do it makes the game very frustrating at times. I would say that I get 2 5 days a month were the game runs like I feel it should run. I feel like im turning correctly things LOOK right and the game is so enjoyable. The other 25 to 28 days out of the month its completely impossible to play.Update after Rocket Pass Update.....This game is pretty much no longer playable for me after the Rocket Pass update. Car is harder to turn more than ever. I can rule out Drivers WIndows updates IE updates Internet connection 200MB Down 50 Up controllers as I've made sure all are new and or updated. It's almost like there is a 2 3 second delay from what I do with the controller to what is shown on the screen. Deadzone at .05 and sensitivity at 2.0 and car will not turn. Devs were also no help. I feel I can no longer recommend this game if it doesnt work the same for each user. To add I willno longer be spending any money on services crates Keys updates cars Rocket Passes or anything else that has to so with this game if they can't get it working for everyone equally. I hate to let this game go but I feel I'm getting closer and closer to this point. Sadly the only people that will understand this issue are the ones that have this issue. Also I would love for the so called "Pros" of Rocket League to come play on one of our machines so the rest of the players and Devs of this game could see that there really is an issue.Update 10 30 18 Sadly game is still unplayable for me. I guess its time to finally uninstall this game for good! Car still turns like an 18 wheeler....Long and slow!

review: 9/10In short Rocket League is really fun. It brings back memories of playing Mario Kart 64 with my brother and sister growing up yet it manages to make its own mark as a gaming titan in the racing genre. The basics of the game are simple you and a team of fully tricked out cars battle together in a massive soccer arena to score a giant ball. Sounds weird but this game just works... really well. The mechanics are flawless and directly reflect every move you make on your controller. This makes lining up shots very helpful and takes out uncontrollable factors such as relying on an animation to complete your moves. The tutorial is really all you need to know to play and there are different games like basketabll and hockey that add variety to suit your play style. Overtime your skills will improve and the matchmaking system will automatically pair you together with teammates and opponents to keep the game challenging. At any given time there are always enough people online to play with though I found from personal eperience that anytime after 2am (CST) and before 8am you will usually find a few AFKers (almost always an opponent) and will get matched against the same people every few games. This game also offers split screen and cross platform gameplay which for me is a HUGE plus and playing with family and friends makes this game even better. However the only major downside I found for this game is its Loot Crate system. Just from playing the game you will level up and earn XP to unlock new items to trick out your car but sometimes you will earn crates that have to be opened with keys you buy with real world money from the store. However buying a key doesn't guarantuee you will unlock a specific item because the loot crates are randomly generated like a lottery ticket and when you use a key the game randomly selects one item that is usually mediocre. Thankfully in the settings menu there is an option to turn loot crates off which I highly recommend. If you do want exclusive loot I recommend linking your account with the Rocket League Twitch channel to earn free stuff from watching tournaments or just buying DLC items you know you will use. There are also plently of events throughout the year to play new game modes and earn exclusive loot free of charge. Overall this is a really fun game to play solo or can be enhanced with family and friends as the controls are easy enough for anyone to learn. The ability to customize your car adds an extra layer of depth to game to express your personality and make the game your own. There are plently of modes to keep gameplay interesting and you will always be matched with players at your level. Rocket League is good clean fun and even when you put it down to play a new game you'll usually find yourself playing a few rounds every now and again.

review: As you can see i am a really vivid player on this game so i might be a little baised to it.This game came out in 2014 and i played it in 2016 it is a really fun car soccer game almost but it feels like a sport more than a game. You have the mecanics of a sport which are constantly involving you have the mental aspect which you have to train yourself for it. This game is at it's peak today yes there are toxic players in the game but you get that in most games yes at first it is hard but you get a feeling of achievement when you progress through the levels. This game is so much more than it used to be customizablility wise Now you can get banners frames engine sounds and such to customize your car with.There is a playerbase for everyone want to be a trader all your Rocket League life? Do it. Want to be the flashy guy all your Rocket League life? Do it. Want to trtyhard your whole Rocket League life? Do it. Want to chill/freestyle all your Rocket League life? Do it. There is a place for everyone on this game.Overall i love this game if you're hesitant to buy it don't be you'll thank yourself after you buy it and enjoy it.10/10 bought twice because i love trading.

review: Product received for free. At first glance it may seem like a simple arcadey title without much depth. But what Rocket League does have it does better than anything else out there. Psyonix absolutely nailed the game's physics... something I wish more developers would pay more attention to. The gravity the recoil from a collision the punch of the ball off the hood of your car... it feels natural and satisfying every time.Graphically everything from the cars to the background objects you don't even interact with look cutting edge. It includes a perfect level of car customizability from custom paint jobs to antenna toppers while maintaining distinctive elements that allow you to quickly identify teammates versus opponents during fast paced gameplay.And from a gameplay perspective it's perfect for this reason It's simple to pick up quite difficult to master but fun no matter your skill level. I like the fact that the team with the player with the most overall skill often doesn't win. This game rewards teamplay and strategy over all else. This is great news for someone like me who likes to fill the need of the team versus chasing the ball around like a 4 year old on the soccer field. It's interesting how I gel with certain people so much more than others. When you're truly synchronized with someone that symbiosis can make your team nearly unstoppable.Between work and family I often don't have much time to play and Rocket League offers the perfect opportunity to have a satisfying gaming experience in short period of time. With regular content releases it just gets better and better.

review: Rocket League is a game in which you use rocket powered super cars to play fotball/soccer in a dome like arena.It's incredibly fun and I have spent many hours playing.The game gets updated frequently with free content and playmodes aswell as new DLC cars.All cars have minimal differences between each other this goes for the DLC cars aswell.However the differences are not impactful enough for anyone to call it pay to win.All Cars can be outfitted with decals boosts antennas and of course HATS!Cars usually has 5 7 starting decals you can get more from crafting crates and drops.Crates randomly drop after a match and you need keys to unlock them for a random item keys cost real money if you don't want crates you can turn of their visibility in options.The gameplay may seem pretty simple at first but the maneuvers you can pull of in air and on the ground makes for some incredible plays. Positioning adds quite a bit of depth in team matches just getting into the game it might not seem that difficult.Players whom have played the game for many hours can pull of quite incredible manuevers like precise dribbling and flying up in the air to meet the ball for an "aerial hit".For me this game is worth every penny and hour i have spent on it.I am sure that if you give it a try you will enjoy it immensely.

review: Update Fall '18 (Updated) Not much has changed in RL. The community is so very toxic. Psyonix thinks their report system is supposed to fix this but I don't even think it does anything. You can report people but I never see a decrease in the number of people that call you names or go AFK to intentionally lose a match. The UI hasn't been updated to something that makes sense. ...It's just not being improved other than more crates the new rocket pass system (just a different type of crate) and did I mention crates? Still no marketpalce integration. Just a lousy experience.... the only thing good about the game is the core gameplay. but don't queue without a premade team you'll regret it.Psyonix needs to implement a system where you can ban players from being queued with you... it shouldn't be permenent but if someone intenionally loses a match or calls you names because your team mate is a giant douchenozzle you should be able to select a temporary ban from being teamed with such people. ....but this won't happen. I mean they haven't even optimized the UI and the bugs they introduce never get fixed. So I donno. GL having a good eperience...but I doubt it if you're not queuing with a premade team.Update Spring '18 Within the last couple days Psyonix has announced their spring event where they're allowing us to buy more crates and keys from them... yippee. They haven't touched the UI the community is as toxic as ever...if you want to win a competitive match all you have to do is score first. If you get scored on (even sometimes when you're tied with minutes left in the game) your team mates will vote for FF then either intentially lose on purpose or abandon the match if you don't go along with them. Casual games are filled with YouTube highlight farmers and there is a problem with smurfs and derankers in competitive play.Announced recently was the Season 7 rewards No longer will your season rewards be meaningfull to your skill rank. in all previous season you were rewarded for your gameplay with your rank's rewards.... now you will no longer get a reward associated with your "rank." You will get a "tier'd" reward. So no more blue rewards for Diamond Purple for Champ... random meaningless rewards... If I wanted random crap I'd open crates.Oh did I mention they're coming out with some IRL cars? Because I can't wait to send more money to Psyonix for multiple times what similarly priced items in the market are sold for. (like the last set of cars they produced... $10 per car... the type of car you might get out of one of those $0.25 gumball machines at the local grocery store)BTW I hope you like spending multiple times what the game is worth in keys to get any kind of decent in game item because the rarity is set so high that you'll never get what you want without spending 100s of dollars. ...to get any new items when trading expect $30 50 for any of the new items... $100+ for any rare colors. Oh and good luck getting rid of all the crap items you'll get... because there's not steam marketplace integration...so you get to keep the crap they're going to give you. You will never trade them away due to the fact that you can't sell stuff for what it's worth through a marketpalce. You have to advertise you want to trtade something on an independent site and what you're willing to accept for it then add each other to your friends liest both be online at the same time then make the trade... you know instead of having steam marketplace integration where you could just buy the item you are looking for in 1 step. Oh did I mention that 99% of the time the only way you'll be able to trade for things is if you use a key? So if you're item is worth less than a key (the vast majority of crap items found in crates) good luck.The core game is still good... the above frustration is not to say that the game is a bad game. It's not. The core game is still fantastic. ...It's just that issues with the game are not being addressed and it seems that Psyonx seems to only put R&amp D into the next crate and not the game. Why can't I select to find a new match at the end of a non comp game? Why do I have to exit to the main menu EVERY TIME if I want to search for a new non comp game? Why do I have to tab through like 4 or 5 menus to get to the same training module I go into inbetween games 99% of the time? Why not have a couple user definable training modules in the FIRST menue? Why do I have to choose between playlists that includes songs I never want to hear again or no music at all? Why do I come across Champion and Silver teamed opponents in competitive play?But hey we're getting new crates.Update Fall '17 I still play this game on a weekly basis and have (going on) 1500 hours &amp I just made it to Diamond level this season. There have been some bugs along the way...and there are some issues with the UI for people who play the game alot. But the core game is still fantastic...and even with over 1K hours into the game there's still more to learn and achieve. I still very much recommend the game.Original review This game is TONS of FUN! There's a slight learning curve but once you get the basics you're good to go. From getting the basics down you can spend as much time as you want increasing your skills in the game. There is casual and competitive servers so there's a lot of room for growth of the player in the game.I have been a nearly exclusively FPS gamer for a long time. I'm not sure I can say I've had more fun playing with family and friends with this game than with any of my FPS games. If you pick up this game and you should pick up a controller for the PC. This game is a good one to play with a controller over the keyboard and mouse. Even at the full $20 if not found on sale it's definitely worth the price particularly if you have a couple friends to play with. If you don't get a 4 pack and share with your friends.

review: If you like soccer cars and rockets boy do i got a game for you. Rocket League is skill driven (no pun intended) game about car soccer. Just like real soccer it takes a while to get the hang of it and master. Its got a very high skill ceiling and I played for a good amount of time to make the conclusion that if you are willing to put time and effort into this game to get good you will enjoy this game a ton. This game becomes even more fun with friends if you have those. When you first start out the game and community may seem intimidating but once you start to get good you might just get addicted. Rocket League currently costs around $20 and if you are willing to put the time into this game it is worth it. In conclusion rocket league is an insanely fun game (if you put time into it) with a great community. I rate Rocket League an 8.4/10

review: This game really has turned the corner to poopsville population 2 (PUBG sitting right next to it). The servers have not been maintenanced in a year maybe longer based on the lag and server performance when it comes to player v player or player v ball contact. This game used to be a go to game when other games just wouldn't do but sadly this is not the case anymore. The issue with alternate accounts appears to have also dwindled as there seem to not be as many high level players even attempting to play this game in any aspect other than scrims or LAN parties. Very unfortunate that Psyonix would allow this to happen because this is truly a game that everyone can grow to love. I personally have over 2500 hours in this game and did Love the game at one time playing for hours at a time but the love has faded and thus I can only manage a handful of games before the server issues and lack of any consistency of ball movement forces me to turn it off. I hope everyday that Psyonix finds a way to fix these issues and would come out to the "community" announcing actual fixes but I honestly don't hold my breath. At this point Rocket League should either be free to play or forgotten and make Rocket League 2 with completely new servers and doubling to tripling the amount of them.
title: Rocket League®

review: Fun to play with friends.Easy to play casually.Hard to master.I just love it because of the high skillcap there is. It's okay to just hit the ball away from the net but to angle your car the way that it lands right in front of your teammate after a good pinch to do casual ceiling shots with flip resets in it or rotating perfectly for like 2mins in front of your goal without much boost and keeping the enemy from scoring a goal is the real deal in rocket league. Of course the comunity is sometimes pretty toxic but i think every multiplayer comunity has these guys so don't get yourself overworked with these guys and just play with your friends (hopefully) to have a good time. )
title: Rocket League®

review: No matter how many toxic players exist in the community this game is the most addicting sports game i have ever played. It is only and again only dependant on the skills of the player. Of course sometimes kick offs get very unlucky but a good player can always compensate. I always have fun while playing this game. Better with friends. You get even more pleasure once you start rising in the ranked system. Pros Supports mods and workshop items so this is a very big pro Very fun with friends Ranking system is pretty accurate so you (mostly) encounter same skill leveled players A ranked match lasts around 5mins so it is quite time efficient if you are busy throughout the day. Unless you are the unluckiest player in the world skill is the determiner on who's winning the match. Casual game modes make it even better you can just exit when you feel like it. Game gets updated often Nothing can give any advantage to any player other than their skills. Gets insanely enjoyable when you rise in the ranking system. Doesn't affect gameplay untill 100ms ping(if stable).CONS Slightly cancerous community(mostly kids spamming What a Save! in chat) you can disable chat so its okay. Sometimes opponents tend to demo you all the time which can be annoying.(it is a part of the game but still annoying) You will get addicted if you really like the game There will always be players who are better than you It requires immense amount of time to master game mechanics(this actually isn't a con but still)
title: Rocket League®

review: One of the greatest games I have purchased to date. The game is complete and unexpectedly polished it looks and feels like a game that has been out for a lot longer than it has. Admittedly when first released the developers were not prepared for the success it had and the servers occasionally suffered due to such a high population. That is fixed now and unlike other Devs they have acknowledged and apologised for the problems fixing them almost straight away.Great game. 11/10 would buy again.

review: Saw this on Doomsy's twitch stream 3 years ago and thought it looked fun. Rounded up some friends and we've been playing ever since. I've put 2K+ hours into this and despite there being no leveling gearing or advancement it has kept my attention as my main game for all these years a sign of a truley great fun game. You don't need an advancement treadmill to lure you into playing it is just fun. The advantage of that is that it doesn't matter if you take break or introduce a friend that has never played before he won't have to spend days weeks months trying to gear/level up so he can play with you. Everything is based on your skill. The community for Rocket League has been great (plenty of toxic players just like anywhere online) but easy enough features to ignore them or turn off all chat if you like. The game runs great even on older hardware and looks fantastic. The controls and feel are top notch. The esports scene is flourishing and super fun to watch. Best game to play with friends by far. The devs have done a great job of listening to their fans and adding new cosmetic gear maps game modes and being responsives to fixing issues. Servers are stable and low latency even when playing from around the world. My top game for the several years and possibly best ever.
title: Rocket League®

review: After about 200 hours into this title i can finally write a review that will be honest. The joy and anger i get from this game is like no other game before but maybe Counter strike. You either love your team or you wish they would just drop out and let the A.I pick up where they left off.Pros Great joy comes with a win.Meet lots of people who enjoy the game along with you.Trading items.Community overall is good and not toxic except for the hockey mode but its hockey so its okGreat graphics and constant updates to keep the game fresh and alive.Cons Losing a match .Some toxic players will make you leave the match with the constant car demolitions.Some have connection issues I do not have any myself. NA east.Overall I would buy this game again and I plan on playing RL for quite some time.

review: I love this game. Its one of those things I will continually come back to from time to time out of sheer enjoyment. That being said the punishment system is very out of whack. I am by my own admission a "toxic" person and use profanity and racist slurs on a regular basis and do not apologize for that in any way. That also being said the punishment system is quite odd sometimes youll never get banned even if you know someone reported you and on the other end you can be banned multiple times for the same text in a game regardless of whether or not youve already been punished for it. All in all 10/10 would tell someone whats up again. As a sidenote the new update makes it so much better for people that dont like to have to filter themselves. Now you dont actually get banned from playing only from typing custom messages and spamming quick chat.Thanksgiving edit I'm finally decent. It only took like 400 hours but im decent. Come at me.

review: Just abosolutly love this game was one of the first games i purchased when i got my pc back in 2016 have not stopped playing it since then love the items although there is trading and scams you cant stop that i would like it if they did somthing about the scammer issue if people have VALID proof but again there is not much you can do about that (the game is so well made and the learning takes time i love it because you are open to learning new things EVERY DAYi dont care who you are you could be Kronovi he still learns things all the time and developes new stratagies to become victorious over his enemys i sure hope i can make it to GC one day but lol i have a long way ahead of me... im sitting at champ 2 and i have replays from when i was bronze... i always watch pros to see what they are doing a good channel to check out is amustycow (musty) he plays the game well and usually talks about what he is going to do next he thinks out loud when he is recording and it just makes players be able to see what he is thinking and when they do that they have the mindset of a good player then they play better and learn ) TOTALY WORTH THE $10 IF YOU ARE GOING TO BUY IT just one thing people say they hate the rocket pass and psyonix is running out of ideas but i personally dont think its that bad its not like its pay to win and thats another thing i love about this game it is not pay to win and there is almost no way to hack i have NEVER seen a hacker in rocket league never seen speed hacks or anything but beware there is one hack in rumble its called getting spikes...THIS IS ROCKET LEAGUE

review: Rocket League is just a lot of fun.Very simple game with a simple objective and I find it's a very nice casual game to play with friends when we just want to have a good time. Of course though you can take this game very seriously and play competitvely and really test your skills against everyone else.Teamwork is a huge part of this game if you're not playing 1v1 so I strongly recommend playing with people you can communicate well with and strategize with in order to make good plays and score awesome goals.The only real critizism I have is that some people who play this way too seriously like to be a holes and be stupid on the mic or in chat so be wary of that and play nice &lt 3Overall I really enjoy this game and would definitely recommend it to pretty much anyone. Whether you want a new competitive challenge or if you just want a nice casual pastime you can't go wrong with Rocket League.

review: Rocket League is a fun game for players of all skill levels. The simple concept of "put the ball in the net" gives the game an incredibly low skill floor meaning virtually anybody can pick up this game and have a good time with it regardless of their level of talent. The game also boasts an absurdly high skill ceiling thanks to the ability to launch your vehicle into the air and maneuver yourself in a wide variety of ways allowing for kinds of crazy plays from all kinds of crazy angles.The community can be kind of garbage at times but honestly the same could be said about most other communites as well. As long as you don't let a few bad apples spoil the bunch you'll likely end up having yourself a good time with this game.

review: I've played Rocket League for a while now and I strongly recomend it if you are into cars and soccer / football.Pros The devolopers are always updating and giving the game new content Major choices for customising your car for your liking Big community You can play with your friends Lots of fun!Cons Servers can be quite laggy from time to time Some people may try to scam you for your itemsSome times some players can get aggressive or abusive but generally players are nice if you do experience it thought you can report them in game. It might take a while to start getting really good at the game but it's not that hard to learn the game does have training simulators and tries to match you up in a game with players that have simular skill level as you. The game is mainly focused for Online and multiplayer but there is offline options were you can play against AI / Bots. If you are interested I recommend you getting the game!

review: What can I say about this game that someone else hasn't already? Probably nothing but steam want me to review it so here goes. Rocket League has the perfect skill gap and learning curve out of any competitive game I've ever played. Learning in this game is fun and rewarding and because of that moments are memorable. Maybe it's first time you make contact with the ball on an aerial maybe it's the first time you score an aerial goal or maybe it's that time you pulled off the perfect flick after crossing up 2 defenders in over time. My point is if you put the time into RL you will be met with one of the best gaming experiences ever. Period.

review: RL is fun the skill ceiling is insanely high the visuals are great but it has hands down the worst matchmaking i have witnessed in any competetive multiplayer to date.there are way too many people who dont belong in their rank because of how they play. its not even the case of "having a bad match bruh".just imagine you belong to the top 0.5% of the playerbase and you get matched with people who dont even understand the basic mechanics of the game.its like playing league of legends and your jungler refuses to take smite and a leash then dies because of his/her own stupidity and blames you for his/her mistake. sounds absurd right? well thats rocket league in a nutshell for you.you will be teamed up with boosted idiots who dont understand what they are doing.

Can't even play a competitive match cause of the penalty regarding mid game disconnect. I'm not going to recommend this game until Psyonix or whoever it needs to be addresses these issues. The game is NOT enjoyable at this point due to lots of lag. The brazilian community is also extremely toxic as they will ever be.
title: Rocket League®

review: IntroductionA Collegue once told me "You Should really try out Rocket League!" and after searching for it on steam it couldn't really impress me and I ignored it.Playing Football with rocket powered Cars??? What a stupid Idea.....After two / three months he asked again....."What about Rocket League.....you already tried it ?" and I was like "No! And I won't play this stupid Game!"I think some Days later after he asked me the second Time i forced myself to buy it for 19 99 .I can't do anything wrong with 19 99 thats what I've told myself.I started the Game and set all the Options i need to feel good to go.I chosed a Car..."Breakout" maybe and started my first Match with a random Guy.The Controls of the Car were kinda good and the graphics and sound were satisfying and there wasn't anything to complain about.I rarely hit the ball and I drove like a maniac and tried everything to "kick" the ball into the opponents goal.After some time I managed to score and felt like a unbeatable badass!!! I played Rocket League for 2 3 Days and everything went good so far and I ranked a little bit up ( Silver I ? ) I really can't tell.I reached Silver !!! What a great feeling to rank up and now they can eat my virtual dust! I felt so confident that I just played like before without much improvement.I failed so hard and some of the guys were flying through the air and hitting the ball like there was no tomorrow.....I didnn't even knew how to get that high to reach the ball! It was frustrating.I stopped playing Rocket League after some days of total devastation.I couldn't believe it and I stopped playing for some months.After this Time I could start the game again and I promised myself to get better!Now after 1000 Hours of playing the Game you can clearly see that I diddn't gave up and trained to became better!Pro's &amp Con'sI really don't want to go deep into the driving mechanics and differences between the Cars.There are a lot of Guides out there!Pro's + NO Pay 2 Win+ Cars have the same speed+ even without DLC Cars you have a good amount of Cars to choose from+ Cars can be customized ( Paint Wheels Decals Trails Boosts Topper &amp Antennas )+ different Modes to play ( Standard Competitive Dropshot Basketball Hockey &amp Rumble )+ Training Mode !+ Many Arenas ( 10 Standard 1 Seasonal 5 alternative and 6 Rocket Labs arenas )+ Good Soundtrack for the Game and from Time to Time more songs has been added through an update + Season Rewards after a Season Ends+ You get random rewards after a Match has ended+ Ranking System ( Global Rank from 1 to 74/75 and from Unranked to Grand Champion )+ You can trade your Items with other players Worldwide+ Updates after Updates with bugfixes new Content and Events !+ Rocket League has a huge community+ Fair matchmaking + Many options ( Controls Graphics Sound and misc. )+ Items from a Crate won't give you ingame advantages and you only get cosmetic stuff for you or for other CarsNeutral +/ Crates can only be opned with Keys which can be obtained by buying them through the Game.The Prices for some Keys are fair and some money will fill up the Price Pool for upcoming Tournaments.Buying Keys CAN be addictive and you might buy more Keys as you really want! So be warned !+/ High Learning Curve You are going to need a lot of Time to get better ! Don't give up!Con's Can be frustrating sometimes but that doesn't count. )Servers are sometimes unstableConclusionShort and simple...You planned to buy Rocket League to have some Fun without playing ranked / competitive? Then buy It!You planned to get good in Rocket League and have some Fun and play ranked / competitive as well ? Buy it as well but be aware of the learning curve! This won't be a smooth ride but you will get rewarded with a lot of Fun great matches solid graphics good sound and harder opponents ).Maybe im going to edit some small things later on but it won't be anything Important.Feel free to ask me down below in the comment section!See you online!
title: Rocket League®

review: This is one of the most addictive games I have ever played. When I first heard about it I was like 'a football game with cars how would that be good or fun in any way?'Here I am with almost 1000 hours on that same game I thought would be terrible.Multiple times I have stopped playing this game as I wasn't winning was bored of it and wanted something new. Each and everytime I took a break I found myself always coming back to it again and again. I also always seem to find something new to focus on everytime I play whether that be aerials dribbling defence passing etc. There is nearly always something that I found myself wanting to improve or gaining a higher rank than where I was previously.Even after 900+ hours I still find this game fun and enjoyable to play.

review: Very fun. More than just a "soccer game with cars". Its simple yet complex. Not much has changed to the gameplay since the beginning but new mechanics and tricks are still discovered. Lots of potential. And best thing is all the mechanics are doable with practice/effort. Although some are harder to grasp. Basically theres always room for improvement and new things to learn. While this is true for every game its more prominent in this game as the skill sets are very specific and you can almost tick off boxes of what you can and cannot do in stages. Theres also freedom of how to use these skills in different situations.Tip tho at first it may be frustrating that you cannot comprehend the game physics but trust me its worth it once you do.

review: TLDR Fun to play hard to master. Tons of items to collect and deck your car out with. One of the best games I have ever played. Got it free on PlayStation Plus and loved it so much that I decided to purchase a PC copy. This game is easy to pickup and hard to master. The only issue I have is the crate and key system but that seems to be an industry standard at this point '(. Recently they did an update to let the players earn keys through playing the game which is a great idea from my standpoint. Just hoping people don't abuse it.Edit Crate / Key system not that big of a deal they implemented it well enough. The addition of Rocket Pass allows you to know what you are getting as long as you are willing to put in the time for it. Over 500 hours played and am still getting better everyday

review: OK so i have a good basis of they game now to finally give it a review and overall i would certainly give it a thumbs up. the game play is awesome there is always something new to learn and when you hit those nutty shots your happy meter gets a mega boost. i have yet to find this game boring and it always gets me to come back. however there are a few down falls to the game. one is the people who play mostly in rank can get really toxic and after reading other reviews i can see that its a pretty well known problem. the other huge problem with this game is the servers.i have never played a full rocket league game where i did not lag at least once and usually it does it at the worst time. with the recent update i was happy cause i thought they fixed this problem and had addressed the issue BUT NOPE instead they made the problem worse. and rocket league lag is probably the most frustrating lag in the universe because even if it lags a little you will miss the ball for sure. so at the moment its got a few issues that is does need to adress but it has given me countless hours of fun and the skill ceiling is endless so its worth it in my eyes.

review: vrrrrrr vrrrrr vrrrrrrrr VROOOOOM BOOOM aaaaaaaaaaRocket League is a simple game at first but has so much hidden depth once you keep playing. It's all in the gameplay. Rocket League's gameplay is unbelievably satisfying and lacks any obligatory message that many games are pay to win circa 2017 . Each match starts off relatively the same depending on if you're playing singles doubles or triples but each game will unfold differently requiring the player to adapt. As you keep playing you learn more about the game's tactics and flow and seeing yourself gain new skills and progress in gameplay is undeniably fun.

review: To start things off if you don't want to read through this review buy it. Ah where do I begin. Graphics If you have a medium to high end PC this game is gonna be fkn beautiful. I love staring at my car with the graphics on high. Now my buddy who has integrated graphics is not getting the best visuals for obvious reasons. The game looks very colorful which I like especially in a game with an atmosphere like this one. Controls Well from what I know the controls on keyboard and mouse are weird but I think you can rebind them so not much of a problem but I play on my Xbox One controller because I prefer controllers on racing games and such. The controls feel meant to be with a controller and I have no complaints. Gameplay There are casual and competitive gamemodes so don't be too intimidated you filthy casuals. I personally have fun with both gamemodes but it can be very rage inducing when you derank in comp. But overall the gameplay and everything you can do with scoring and saving goals is always fun and doesn't get stale for me. The replay value in this game is incredible and I have over 100 hours if i'm including my ps4 hours and I still have no signs of stopping. The car customization in this game actually makes me want to trade and open crates. I love how this game isn't pay to win with their crates making it only cosmetics you get in them. Audience This game attracts pro and casual players kids and adults I feel like everyone can enjoy some part in this game. Difficulty You can make this game as difficult as you want with ranked it's gonna be hard but with some casual modes. like rumble you can just mess around and sit back. This game is what you make it. Overall the visuals are stunning the default controls are weird on keyboard and mouse but if you change it it will be fine and the controls on controller are meant to be. The audience is anyone really and there are a variety of modes to appeal to everyone. This is a great game 8.5/10
title: Rocket League®

review: Simplicity is the perfect way to describe this game. Its core gameplay mechanic is basically soccer with vehicles however.. these aren't just your regular old cars they're ROCKET POWERED CARS! The game features vibrant and futuristic tracks that tie in well with the theme of flying rocket powered vehicles. The game has alot to offer with mechanics ranging from basic flips and rolls to maneuvering your vehicle though the air to score incredible aerial goals. Rocket League also features some of the most competitive E Sports tournaments showcasing some of the greatest and most technically advanced gameplay this title has to offer. With beautiful graphics fast gameplay and a banging soundtrack Rocket League offers you a truly unique experience.

review: As someone who isn't big into first person shooters I picked up Rocket League with enthusiasm as a competitive strategic exhilirating experience and I can say that it has never disappointed me. It is the most addictive game I have ever played and brings me back to my days as a kid playing mario kart and leaning side to side to try to make my car turn or move faster. Especially with some of the planned updates in the next few months I think this game is going to enter the new mainstream and become one of the most popular games on the market especially when the battle royal fad dies off. I recommend this game to anyone who is competitive and enjoys a good time. The game can be as casual as you want it to be. I prefer the competitive aspect but you can just play casually as well!

review: Product received for free. Product recieved with purchase of Zotac GTX 1060 6GB GPU in August 2017.I LOVE THIS GAME!I am not much of a soccer fan but this twist on soccer is amazing. The multitude of vehicles available and the many ways in which to customize them is unbelievable and more items are obtained during gameplay. Use the training areas. Play have fun meet other like minded individuals. This game is great for socializing with friends playing solo in a 1v1 match or as a solo player on a team of other solo players 2v2 3v3 it is all fun enjoyable and frustrating.You will lose but you will also win. The aerial aspect is something I have not figured out yet but it is fun trying. This game incorporates flying driving and soccer all into one.Edit 20181124 The aerial aspect still eludes me but I am working on it. This game is quite fun without aerial stunts but they do add an additional variation on the game that when done properly look quite impressive.

review: Long Review This is a really great game to play with friends and family just hook up some controllers or go online and play some crazy matches. There are at least 3 basic game modes ranked and un ranked classic matches (soccer) hoops (basketball) snowy day (hockey) as well as rumble for some chaotic fun. The game constantly gets new maps new game modes and the DLC content is mostly aesthetic. However it is true that some cars (each car has a different hitbox) are DLC content and these automobile will come in different sizes therefore changing the area in which they can hit the ball/puck. In short Overall this is a great game with tons of game modes/ maps/ loot updated regularly. It is one of the rare cross platform multiplayer games with the Nintendo switch being one of them. Who knows maybe you can randomly match up with some of your friends playing on other consoles.

review: If you don't like sports games or racing games ... this is neither. There's a somewhat steep learning curve where you're just happy you made contact with the ball but once you get the hang of things it's very addictive. There's a large skill gap and now a bunch of different modes to play. I like that matches take less than 10 minutes (5 minute rounds plus replays goal kicks and possible overtime). I also like that the DLC is only cosmetics I haven't bought any of them and it hasn't affected the gameplay at all.I'm editing this review for the Steam Awards stuff. D

review: Rocket League is a wonderful multiplayer game and is great for anybody who wants more than to simply complete a game. Rocket League can be played with friends online making the game much more fun. I don't have too many bad things to say about the game but here are a few. Keys which are very important to the game are extremely hard to obtain especially for any beginners. The only way to get a key is by buying them with real money or looking in trading groups and even then keys are hard to trade for. The game can cause quite a lot of lag especially for slower computers.Other than that the game is quite enjoyable and I recommend it to anyone who has read this review.

review: Very unique and fun game. It's very skill based and you're going to want to practice your mechanics in free play to improve at a good rate. Learning mechanics and constantly practicing them is probably the best way to improve and climb in the ranks. I can tell you right now that playing fast with a controller will probably bring in the most wins. Be weary of the toxic and stupid community though most people on this game aren't fun to talk to. I would honestly just go ahead and mute chat if that kind of thing annoys you.

review: This is not a game for beginners. In my 4500+ hours I have played I learned more about the game than I have even learned about my own self. This game will push you down and you will have to push back. One of my friends Camkilla can vouch for me when I say that "just hit it in the goal oh my god my teammates are actually " Camkilla or "Do you think I will get banned if I call this kid the N word again" Camkilla. Camkilla might not be the most level headed player but we can easily both agree on one thing. This is very much a thinking man's game. If you are fond of games that take actual skill like bad rats rats revenge (one of my personal favorites) or Pokemon Special Pikachu edition this game is right up your alley. I know how important your time is so I am gonna cut it off right here and leave you with one last question. What are you waiting for?

review: Original review here at top. FIX THE BAN SYSTEM BY REMOVING AUTO BAN BOTS AND ADD A FREAKING CENSOR FILTER. UNTIL THEN I CAN NOT RECOMMEND THIS TITLE.New review below this line.So it appears the auto ban system is fixed. A certain level of toxicity as the community would call it is and should always be acceptable. It is called trash talking and getting into the game. It is another way to get into your opponents head. It is not always a bad thing. In fact it is much enjoyable. However... There are too many whiny brats that can't handle a little trash talk. That should never be a bannable offense not when the option to MUTE is readily available both in text and voice there is a mute option. Now that that seems to be addressed I do have some small gripes with the ban system still. When you have a team mate that knows not how to play as a team mate and can't take a suggestion like please stop ramming me or please stop chasing the ball the team mate throws a tantrum and ultimately the game. Those jerks should have a time out. 15 minutes would be great that way you don't get stuck back in game or on the same team with them. If you report them for unsportsman like behavior it seems there is no ban in effect for it. I would much appreciate the ability to not have to play with someone that is simply going to throw games because they don't like suggestions. On that same topic of people throwing I have a lot of people throw simply because they don't like my names or support of OUR President Mr Donald J Trump. When they throw because they don't like my names they should be held accountable for their actions and appropriate bans applied. All that ban system talk out of the way.... Where do I begin. Well you could start by looking at my time played. You could start by buying the game or trying it during the free weekend events that they have. You could start by playing it at a friends house on a console system. Or you could just start by reading this review. The bots in the game for solo play do a lot of nothing for giving you a challenge but they do offer beginners the opportunity to learn the basics and skills necessary before jumping in online matches against real opponents. The season mode is fun for just that purpose but after you beat it once there really is no more fun in it. The training mode IMHO is absolutely a necessity before playing online. Learning how to hit the ball at any and all angles. Learning how to utilize your boost and get serious air to get to the ball that would otherwise fly right over your head. It is fantastic and really well put together. Other games that have "Training modes" don't typically offer or benefit the end user as much as this does. You simply need give it 15 or 20 minutes training and get the fundamentals down and you will be high flying and knocking those goals left and right. If after you do training and are looking to hone you skills to diamond rank or above the Steam Workshop offers hundreds of great training tools. They will get your defense to be unbreakable your offense unmatched and your ball handling better than Michael Jordans ever was guiding the ball through the air and into the opponents goal with nothing but net. It has become an addiction of mine to collect at least one of every item type in this game and in that this game has become outrageously expensive for me. I don't try to get every painted or certification for every item but I have accomplished several painted sets for standard items. What I am talking about are the cosmetics you can acquire either by playing the game and earning them or receiving loot crates and paying 5 dollars for 5 keys to open the crates. It's a standard system that seems like it is going to somewhat go away in favor of a 10 dollar season pass. It should be starting fairly soon. If they do stick with the season pass model and go away from loot boxes I can see myself saving a tad of money unless of course.... the items you earn only come from leveling up.. And I believe..... they stated that you could buy levels as well once the season pass is launched. I am not sure how I feel about this or if it will make me stop playing or play even more. One thing I do simply disagree with is the items not being able to be sold on the steam market place. As it stands many people have paid a lot of money acquiring this items and the Black Market Decals go for as much as 70 keys. BMD's and certain Painted Cars and items go for big bucks. Some of the items I would rather sell/cash out on so I could continue buying more crates or other goodies on steam or pocketing cold hard cash. It is that way for many of the other big titles on steam that have their own market place so it seems like that should be a logical next step. As for the game modes. Unranked games offer a huge range of different modes like hockey basketball and a tile breaking mode (name has slipped my mind..) The ice hockey uses a flat puck and is on ice completely changing the dynamics of how you play. Though playing the hockey is considerably easier than normal modes in that the puck unlike a ball typically stays on the ground. It gives you a chance to learn the controls and cars a lot before you go trying to chase a ball down. Basketball was the hardest mode for me to adapt to in that you have to pop the ball into the air to score. Once you get the hang of it though rank games become a lot more fun because you have learned how to control the ball both of the ground and in the air. The tile smashing game is choatic and down right hard in the beginning. It is special though and rewarding once you get your first win you will probably put a good 50 hours into it. I want to see the rocket league community grow. The rank system seems to be off because I have been stuck in gold this season but as long as my team mate isn't throwing... I dominate everyone I play. My last game before writing this was 9 2. I had 8 goals and two of them I made using my keyboard though I don't recommend the keyboard but sometimes my controller (which is a pos) acts all funny on me and I have to unplug it and replug it in and hope it wants to work. I hope more of you considering the game stop considering and make the dam purchase already. You will lose yourself to Rocket League. You will also lose any friends job significant others and family in the process but I promise you it is sooooooooo worth it. Even if you don't get the game on sale and it does go on sale a lot it is worth every penny you end up paying for it. One last mention... The music in this game is TOP TIER. It seems in almost every major update another huge album worth of original music is added. With only a handful of songs not to my liking one really can't help but be impressed with just how much there is. Though I must admit.... Infinte Power by The Fat Rat is a guilty pleasure of mine and I crank that shiit up when I need to get into the spirit and score some goals.. I thank you for taking the time to briefly go through this short review. You will love this game otherwise you need to lock yourself in your basement with all your filthy hentai and waifu games and never ever speak to civilized gamers again.. Thanks I'm out!DAM IT!! I am addicted
title: Rocket League®

This game is relatively cheap too (only 20 bucks or less during sales) and therefore definitely worth buying. And as for most games playing with friends means even more fun!25 11 2018 After 3 years of playing the game is still awesome and enjoyable!

review: No matter how good you get you'll always feel like trash. It's not like Fortnite where if you've played for long enough you can go ham on a couple of defualts/bots. No in this game you're always matched up against playes with similair skill to yours. Although according to Rocketleague I'm pretty high up in rank (Champ II in 3v3) I still feel like I'm at this game. This game gives you some insight on what it's like having a unloving father. No matter how hard you try no matter how many hours no matter how much effort you put into this game you'll never feel like you're enough.So if you've always had a loving and supporting father (figure) in your life definitely worth checking this game out! All in all fun game don't bother with trading and lootboxes though. Every item you own eventually gets boring so much so that I'm currently rocking default set up with a ton of keys worth of items in my inventory.Am looking for some folk to play with and a doubles partner atm (Diamond III 2v2 EU servers). So hit me up anytime if you want to play! Peace

review: This game starts off as such great fun but as you get better and start learning the mechanics it becomes so much more. The competition is fierce and the games always exciting. the ranking system works fairly well so it's not often you get paired up against someone significantly better than you... unless they are a smurf. the game is always evolving and even though the basic rules are always the same the way people go about scoring is always being improved. Watching professional players matchup is amazing and unlike any other esport in my opinion.

review: I KONGRESSEN 4 juli 1776Den enhälliga deklarationen av Amerikas tretton förenta staterNär det under den mänskliga historiens gång blir nödvändigt för ett folk att upplösa de politiska band som har förbundit dem med ett annat folk för att bland världens makter inta den självständiga och jämbördiga ställning som både naturliga och gudomliga lagar berättigar dem till krävs av respekt för världsopinionen att de redogör för orsakerna bakom separationen.Vi ser dessa sanningar som självklara att alla människor är skapade jämlika att de av sin skapare har tilldelats vissa oförytterliga rättigheter och att rätten till liv frihet och strävan efter lycka finns bland dessa att regeringar har inrättats bland människorna för att säkra dessa rättigheter och att regeringarna erhåller sina befogenheter genom de styrdas samtycke att närhelst någon styrelseform motverkar dessa mål så är det folkets rättighet att förändra eller upphäva denna styrelseform och att inrätta en ny enligt de principer som för folket framstår som de mest troliga att påverka deras trygghet och lycka. Klokheten påbjuder att styrelseformer som inrättats sedan lång tid tillbaka inte bör ändras av alltför lättvindiga eller flyktiga skäl och likaledes har all erfarenhet visat att människor är mer benägna att lida om det onda är uthärdligt än att avskaffa de styrelseformer vid vilka de har vant sig. Men när en lång kedja av missbruk och övergrepp uppenbarar en medveten plan att försätta dem under total despotism så är det folkets rättighet det är deras plikt att avskaffa en sådan styrelseform och att skapa nytt skydd för sin framtida säkerhet. Sådant har dessa koloniers tålmodiga lidande varit och sådan är nu nödvändigheten av att förändra dessa koloniers tidigare styrelseformer. Den nuvarande kungen av Storbritanniens historia är en historia om upprepade oförrätter och övergrepp vilka alla haft som direkt syfte att upprätta ett oinskränkt tyranni över dessa stater. För att styrka detta låt fakta framläggas inför en öppen värld.Han har vägrat att godkänna lagar som är synnerligen viktiga och betydelsefulla för det allmännas bästa.Han har förbjudit sina guvernörer att anta lagar som varit av omedelbar och tvingande betydelse såtillvida inte redan stiftade lagar har upphävts till dess att hans godkännande har inhämtats och när de så har inhämtats så har han fullständigt struntat i att behandla dem.Han har vägrat att godkänna andra lagar för inkvartering av stora delar av befolkningen såtillvida dessa människor inte avsäger sig rätten till representation i den lagstiftande församlingen en rättighet som för dem är ovärderlig och som endast av tyranner kan ses som mindre betydelsefull.Han har sammankallat lagstiftande församlingar till udda och obekväma platser långt ifrån förvaringsstället för offentliga handlingar med det enda syftet att trötta ut dem så att de tillmötesgår hans åtgärder.Han har upprepade gånger upplöst folkrepresentationen för att den med oförfärad fasthet motsatt sig hans övergrepp mot folkets rättigheter.Han har under lång tid efter sådana upplösningar hindrat nya församlingar från att bli valda varefter den lagstiftande makten som aldrig kan försvinna återgått till folket som helhet alltmedan staten under tiden har varit utsatt för alla farorna vid en invasion utifrån och inre omvälvningar.Han har ansträngt sig för att hindra bosättning i dessa stater och med detta i åtanke har han obstruerat lagar för utlänningars möjlighet till medborgarskap vägrat att anta andra lagar för att stimulera migration till dessa stater samt skärpt kraven för överlåtelse av markområden.Han har obstruerat rättsapparaten genom att vägra ge sitt godkännande till lagar om domstolars inrättande.Han har gjort domare beroende av sin egen goda vilja avseende deras ämbetsperiod samt beloppet på och utbetalningen av deras löner.Han har inrättat en mängd nya ämbeten och sänt hit svärmar av tjänstemän för att plåga vårt folk och tära på dess välstånd.Han har i fredstid haft stående arméer stationerade hos oss utan samtycke från våra lagstiftande församlingar.Han har avsett att göra militären oberoende av och överordnad den civila makten.Han har gått samman med andra för att ställa oss under en lagstiftning som är främmande för vår konstitution och ej i enlighet med våra lagar genom att ge sitt bifall till deras påstådda lagar För att inkvartera stora grupper av väpnade truppstyrkor hos oss För att skydda dem genom skenrättegångar från straff för mord som de skulle begå mot dessa staters invånare För att skära av vår handel med alla världens delar För att pålägga oss skatter utan vårt medgivande För att i många fall beröva oss fördelarna med en juryrättegång För att transportera oss bortom haven för att döma oss för påstådda lagöverträdelser För att avskaffa det fria systemet av engelska lagar i en grannprovins och där tillsätta en maktfullkomlig regering och utvidga dess gränser så att den på en gång blir till ett mönster och passande redskap för införandet av samma oinskränkta styre i dessa kolonier För att beröva oss våra frihetsbrev upphäva våra mest värdefulla lagar och i grunden ändra vårt styrelsesätt För att upplösa våra egna lagstiftande församlingar och ikläda sig själva makten att lagstifta över oss i vilka fall som helst.Han har frånsagt sig styret här genom att förklara oss utanför hans beskydd och genom att föra krig mot oss.Han har plundrat våra hav skövlat våra kuster bränt våra städer och ödelagt vårt folks liv.Han håller i detta ögonblick på att överföra stora arméer av utländska legosoldater för att slutföra dödens förödelsens och tyranniets förehavanden som redan har påbörjats med en grymhet och falskhet som knappast har något motstycke ens i de mest barbariska tider och som är fullständigt ovärdigt ledaren för en civiliserad nation.Han har tvingat de av våra medborgare som tillfångatagits på de öppna haven att bära vapen mot sitt land till att bli deras vänners och bröders bödlar eller till att själva falla för dessas händer.Han har anstiftat till inbördes uppror oss emellan samt ansträngt sig för att uppvigla invånarna i våra gränsområden de skoningslösa vilda indianerna vilkas välkända krigföring innebär ett obönhörligt dödande av alla människor oavsett ålder kön och tillstånd.Vi har vid varje övergrepp i allra ödmjukaste ordalag bett om upprättelse. Våra upprepade skrivelser har besvarats endast med upprepade kränkningar. En furste vars karaktärsdrag sålunda vid varje handling motsvarar en tyranns är olämplig att regera över ett fritt folk.Inte heller har vi undlåtit att uppmärksamma våra brittiska bröder på förhållandena. Vi har från tid till otid varnat dem för försök från deras parlament att utsträcka en oberättigad lagstiftning över oss. Vi har påmint dem om omständigheterna kring vår emigration och bosättning här. Vi har vädjat till deras inneboende rättsmedvetenhet och storsinthet och vi har besvärjat till våra gemensamma släktband för att de ska ta avstånd från dessa övergrepp som oundvikligen skulle störa våra förbindelser och vår korrespondens. Även de har varit döva inför rättfärdighetens och blodsförvantskapets röst. Vi måste därför slå oss till tåls med den nödvändighet som påbjuder vår separation och se på dem på samma sätt som vi ser på resten av mänskligheten fiender i krig i fred vänner.Vi representanterna för Amerikas förenta stater församlade till allmän kongress och vädjande till den högsta domsmakten i världen att se det berättigade i vårt uppsåt kungör och örklarar högtidligt i namn av och med bemyndigande av folket i dessa kolonier att dessa förenade kolonier är och med rättighet bör vara fria och självständiga sater att de är lösta från alla trohetsförbindelser till den brittiska kronan och att alla politiska förbindelser mellan dem och Storbritannien är och bör vara fullständigt upplösta och att de som fria och självständiga stater att de är lösta från all XD

review: Rocket league has suited me well for my break from FPS games it requires near to no performance to obtain decent fps although after 10 hours it may seem repetitive constantly switching vehicles and watching many Esport videos can keep you interested. The physx of the game are perfect (obviously since its the whole point) and tbh its really rare to find bad netcode in respect with my 40 hrs ingame so far. Multiplayer offers a wide variety of different game modes which also reduce the chance of u getting bored as they can all match different playing styles of various players... Lastly the training in rocket league ACTUALLY works as in you will see amazing differences in your gameplay unlike many other games.

review: If you dont already know about rocket league at this point... you have a lot to learn...Regardless this game is extremely addicting for absolutely no reason even when i dont want to play anything i still manage to log into this game somehow. there is no wrong way of playing rocket leauge just defend your net and dunk on your opponents. the controller support in rocket league is fantastic im sure if you wanted to push your skills to the limit you could probably plug in a dance mat controller to show how crazy you are at rcoket league lol. but seriously the community is a solid 50/50 you will meet cool people and toxic people its very divided but if you are willing to learn this game you learn to ignore the toxic comments and take help where you can get it. it doesnt take long to learn the controls in rocket league but the mechanical skill and game skill is what separates the high end players from any other player in rocket league. regardless if yoyu have yet to try this game i highly recommend it.

review: Unique physics compared to every other "esports game" I can think of. Fun to play casually as well with different game modes and cool workshop maps.Besides the million toxic weebs (seriously) who blame losses on everything but themselves this game is enjoyable and has great mechanics with a high skill ceiling. Many options for car customizationRecommend turning chat off or only allowing quick chat when playing rankedFind nice people to play with around your rankI can't not recommend this game because it's unique different offers fun casual/competitive gamemodes and it's playable on high level with both a controller or KBM. Overall 8/10

review: I don't like playing sports games a whole lot the sports games that I do like were the old NFL and NBA Street games. Unfortunately I wasn't much into this game when it first came out since I found the hype of it super annoying. I got over myself recently thankfully so I could enjoy this fun game.In this game you'll find a diversely themed map selection many different maps and modes that don't follow the 'classic' layout or themes that can shake things up when you're frustrated or bored with the classic layouts or modes. Mechanics of the cars are pretty solid and the ball hit detection is always accurate which is one thing I was worried about. Graphics are good it runs well you don't need to worry about performance issues.Overall the game is super fun but I do have criticisms.I suppose to sell the game for $20 the developers decided to go the lootbox route for cosmetics. While this is the best and non intrusive way of introducing extra paid content for the game I would personally much rather pay for the items that I want rather than this artificially applied rare status with lootbox RNG. For example if there is a paintjob that I really want but is considered very rare I most likely will not get that from the myriad of lootboxes that they have in this game you only get one item from each lootbox and they don't all have the same items within them. You can indeed see which lootboxes have which items but it's rather frustrating to not get what you want and the item that you do receive you cannot use since it is for a specific car that you may or may not have or don't like to begin with.I will add though that I think Rocket Pass is a good idea I guess they took cues from Fortnite. I can work toward certain cosmetics every Rocket Pass season and through leveling up I can attain "seasonal" items. Great idea I like this better than lootboxes.One other criticism that I have is the what it seems anyways lack of player control on who they play with. I come across many many toxic players (even on your own team) who want to spam chat with "What a save!" multiple times when you miss a block but when you do the same in return only once you are met with them typing into chat how much of a &lt pick a derrogatory term&gt you are and that you should quit the game.You are able to report people in this game for chat abuse harassment or unsportsman like conduct but I don't have any insight on how this affects matchmaking. I would rather the people who constantly get reported for that type of thing to get matched up together rather than matching up toxic people with people who are just playing casual (not ranked) and aren't worried about winning or losing.I would say that 30% of the time I get matched up with toxic players who think of themselves as Rocket League gods and everyone else is beneath them. When I don't get matched up with these types of players though the game is very enjoyable and fun to play inbetween workout sets.

review: I've been playing Rocket League since March 2017 on PS4. Got the game on PC November 15th of this year and the grind to Champion Rewards is still fun everytime. It's obviously better to play with friends but just like most players above Platinum I play this game solo most of the time. It can be frustrating if you have bad teammates in a ranked game and the community is toxic in game for no reason sometimes but that's only one part of it. The game itself is very fun and has a steep learning curve that makes it rewarding to progress. The only downside and feature I would like to see implemented would be a way to transfer items from PS4 to PC.

review: This game begun as a great game delving into unexplored potential. Initially my experience was excellent and I could not stop playing. I got into a group of friends and we grinded hard and had fun for a couple of years but recently the game lost its fun for me. I still play sometimes with friends but the game has kinda faded out. I cant say whether or not this is because of updates meta changes or my views on games shifting but I can say that the game fulfilled its purpose and was definitely worth the money. I would not trade in the fun I had for years for 20 dollars and I think the experience is one worth having.Edit I have over 2000 hours across platforms and accounts.

review: Exactly like the gameplay videos on youtube show. You practice grasping the physics in the game (gravity boosting speed and turning speeds) then you start to really have fun. Even a simple hop before u hit the ball changes the height the ball bounces and that is enough to have me laughing when it gets passed opponents. No headaches in this game except from own mistakes with timing jumps but there is so much action soon after that the kicks and joys overwhelm a few mistakes. Even my terrible defense caught on slow mo replays from accidental own goals make me laugh. Enjoy the game it is often on sale. No in game purchases necessary to reach competitive levels.

review: First off I love this game so much! I have not loved a game so much since red dead redemption. But the only downfall is the community. At times they can be so toxic that it ruins your experience playing rocket league. But there are days where you see the good side of the community. Overall...if you don't mind a toxic community then this game is for you!!Game 10/10 Community 3/10

review: This was a positive review.I only play Snow and Hoops and I'm a (very) casual player. It's a game dunno why some people take it so seriously lol.Well whats the problem? The problem is that Snow and Hoops were both casual modes and both had really friendly player bases. Now it's ranked ONLY. No more casual option which means it's just full of toxic players.For the people that say "just hide ranking on snow".......your missing the point. When it was casual I could just jump out if I didn't gel with my teammates (read as get fed up of watching teammates ball chase to only end up missing 95% of the time). Now I'm stuck usually with players that won't forfit even if you were 100 0 down. Turns a 5min fun game into a 15min torture round.Hardly as much fun anymore I'll play a couple of rounds and end up turning it off.

review: Okay lets get this straight. I don't even like football and I FIND THIS game ADDICTIVE AF!This game is great to play with friends and easy to pickup but alot harder to master P10/10 would play football with cars again!UPDATE I still play this game to this day as you can see i've sunk alot of hours into this game and i still think im no where near the level of play i want to be This game is like CRACK. Its one of the only games where i can feel myself progressing the more i play. Even if my rank doesn't show it.UPDATE 2 I love this game so much i can't even describe it its one of the best purchases i've made on steam alone.The skill ceiling has once again increased since i last played and have been getting back into it these last couple of weeks looking to get Champion atleast by the end of season GC if i can but thats the dream.

review: Rocket League is just one of the best "sports" games ever made. It seems very simple on paper (soccer with RC cars) but when you actually play it you see that there is a finesse to actually being good at the game. Besides that though the game is fun at the most casual level too and it even has hats. Some of the microtransaction stuff seems a little scummy but the game is old now and I assume that's the only source of income for Psyonix at this point. Either way the game itself is a real winner.

review: Rocket League is one of those games you really don't expect to be as good as it is.In Rocket League you take on your opponents in an exciting match of car soccer reminding you of those few Top Gear episodes. Where it differs from reality is the ability to jump boost and combo your way into the enemy's goalpost. While the central theme is teamwork and cooperation you might just choose to play duels 1v1 style if that's what you prefer.The most exciting thing about this game is the amount of customization making each car feel unique with hundreds of decals hats boosts goal explosions and much more.Gameplay wise there's around three dozen maps to play on each with its own feel and visuals such as background explosions when scoring goals. The only cons would be the community itself which has the classic sportsmanship salt that comes with it and the amount of DLC most of which useless since the best car at least the one most used in pro play is the one you start with.Would definitely recommend buying especially during the sale in which the price is just 10 .
title: Rocket League®
